atmsystem

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • atmsystem.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    The purpose of this class is to implement BankAccount objects for the ATM network

      • getBankID

        public java.lang.String getBankID(CashCard c)
        This method gets the BankId for a given CashCard object. It is useful for verifying BankAccount data
        Parameters:
        c - The CashCard to get the ID from
        Returns:
        The ID of the CashCard
